website_summaries.verdict: This book is intelligently written with question styles and difficulty on par with the actual exam. However, it should be used as a supplement, not as a sole source of study.
pros: you will not get bored with the introductions, descriptions, and strategies
Provides insightful tricks and tips to narrow down choices
cons: Brand recognition: we are unsure who the actual authors of this series are
Also, this book alone is not comprehensive enough to provide a well-rounded preparation

customer_reviews.title: All you need
customer_reviews.text: Straight and to the point. Focused more on test taking strategies than examples but the examples did the job. I got some of the highest scores on my GRE and only took it once.
customer_reviews.author: Keilly

customer_reviews.title: The GRE prep 2016 study guide provides a useful overview of what to expect from the GRE
customer_reviews.text: The GRE prep 2016 study guide provides a useful overview of what to expect from the GRE, providing useful review information on algebra and geometry as well as approaches to thinking about the writing portions of the GRE, pacing, and thought problems. There are also some trial questions. Overall this was an affordable book that was just what I needed to prepare for the exam.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wagner

customer_reviews.title: great book
customer_reviews.text: Excellent problems. Very well explained. This is a very helpful book for people that are about to take the gre exam. Good quality. I received this product for free as an exchange of my honest and unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: SuperPoderosa

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN KAPLAN!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This study guide provided me with the refreshment I needed especially for the Quant Section. I believe if I had made use of this study guide earlier before taking practice tests for the GRE, I would've realized how great I was doing! I started with the Kaplan books and felt so confused because I forgot the basics. This book does the job!! If you get this book and the fee CD/DVD all you need to do is practice free questions online to build on what you forgot. I am a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Study Guide
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product as a GRE prep tool! It's not going to miraculously teach you information that you've never learned, but it's great for making you feel prepared to go into the test. It gives you all kinds of little tricks and tidbits as to how the test works. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: meeks

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful
customer_reviews.text: This book did a great job of breaking down the sections of the GRE and giving tips to help you study and what to focus on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend spending more than the price of this book when ...
customer_reviews.text: Affordable. Wouldn't recommend spending more than the price of this book when studying for the GRE. All the practice exams are free online, anyway. Those probably prepped me the most, but this book has some nice pointers, especially in the writing analysis section.
customer_reviews.author: Kyler H.

customer_reviews.title: Only overview of the GRE Test. Can not depend ...
customer_reviews.text: Only overview of the GRE Test. Can not depend on the complete preparation of the GRE. Does not worth money.
customer_reviews.author: K K Shah

customer_reviews.title: It's super effective in not only helping me understand what material ...
customer_reviews.text: The study guide is a major stress reliever. It's super effective in not only helping me understand what material will be on the GRE, but also techniques in how to approach questions in each section
customer_reviews.author: Shaban Javed

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Excelent book it has a lot of good tips. Its easy to reed and to understans. It also has practice test.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: A Break from those Study encyclopedias
customer_reviews.text: Really informative...Helped out a lot for my GRE prep. A nice break from using those over sized study guides filled with so much information one can become overwhelmed. This guide is straight to the point. Hits all the major keys and includes a practice test in the back. I was well prepared using this one guide.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.Shaw

customer_reviews.title: No author or publisher listed
customer_reviews.text: It's good, it is easy to read and it has helpful tips but I am a bit wary as there is no publisher or author listed anywhere. This makes it difficult to look up the accuracy of the content. Other than that, it has been useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good book with a ton of spelling and grammar mistakes. However, I liked the essays and organization!
customer_reviews.author: Laura R.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great study tool. Has many tips on how to achieve a better understanding of test
customer_reviews.author: Breeana

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this study guide because it explained everything on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this study guide because it explained everything on the test and provided practice questions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who made this book seems like I could of typed this all up after looking ...
customer_reviews.text: This book has a lot of extra information you do not need. The practice test that are provided are not formatted in gre style completely. Who made this book seems like I could of typed this all up after looking at good study tools like the Princeton review books and then just shipped it off to people as a new product would not buy spend some money on the kaplin or Princeton review books much better material
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vanderham

customer_reviews.title: and it's basically useless. Just use the free prep stuff on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Pain in the butt to get the free cd, and it's basically useless. Just use the free prep stuff on the GRE website!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed studying material, since she now has her bachelor's degree and will be heading off to graduate school. She will be taking her GRE'S in the summer. She was very nervous about the test, but states that this book has put her mind to ease. We are very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen dibble

customer_reviews.title: The worst GRE book i bought ever
customer_reviews.text: This book is baby for GRE. Nothing mentioned in this book.The worst GRE book i bought ever. So , Don't waste your money by buying this book,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a good study guide type book for the GRE
customer_reviews.text: This is a good study guide type book for the GRE. I found while it covers the topics for the test, and gives one practice test, it is not as thorough as some other books I have seen and used myself. I think that this book could use some more examples when describing the types of topics covered, especially in Math. If you are considering getting this book, I would say - consider it, get it as one of the sources for studying, not the only source. This book is not at all extensive to help you review or learn things you don't know. Sample was provided free of charge for a review.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: all study guide key areas
customer_reviews.text: Math analytical and verbal reasoning for gre exam. Good overview of all necessary areas on the GRE Arrived on time Disclaimer: I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review. All my reviews are of my own opinion and I am not compensated in any way by the company. This item is of high value and would pay regular retail price for this item's value. If you find that my review has been helpful, please choose yes below
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Great Prep study book
customer_reviews.text: Great Prep study book. Comprehensive review that covers all likely areas of content that are to be on the test. Includes practice test questions with detailed answers that clearly explain how the answer was created. Includes many test taking strategies that even the most experienced test taker can learn from. Up-to-date test questions that really do help prep for the test. Product was received at a discounted rate in exchange for a fair and honest review.
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: Great prep book!
customer_reviews.text: This GRE Test Prep Book is a great study guide when preparing for your GRE test. I am using this in addition to other study guides. This is my second GRE prep book and I think they are well laid out and executed. It's not just full of multiple choice questions but explains what the actual test will be like and what answers it will be looking for. I like that GRE includes final warnings and final notes to reiterate what you should know. I feel that the material was on my reading level and fair enough to understand. I enjoyed the book and hope you will too. I received this item in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonious

customer_reviews.title: I am actually going to take my GRE in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am actually going to take my GRE in the summer. I will study from this book later and update on how I did. Disclaimer: I received a discount in exchange for a review. *note to self: -content (Did the content appear to cover all of the different sections of the exam and what was necessary for a test taker to know?) -practice questions (Were they helpful at assessing your understanding of the content? Were the answer explanations useful for helping you understand what you missed?) -organization (Did the content and flow of the guide appear well organized?) -reading level (Did it seem to fit the target audience?) -formatting (Was everything well formatted?)
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: They were easy to follow and easy to read/understand
customer_reviews.text: -Content-Covered quite a bit that would need to be known for a GRE test taker. It had a lot of information in it. -Practice questions-These questions helped understand the content of the chapters. They were easy to follow and easy to read/understand. -Organization-Seemed well organized and easy to follow. Easy to find specific topics. -Formatting-Everything appeared to well formatted. No issues here. Overall seemed like a good test prep book. Would and will be recommending it to a friend. *I received this product for a discounted rate to provide my honest feedback*
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Insightful, Helpful with lots of tips to achieve optimum results!
customer_reviews.text: I am about to take my test in a couple of weeks and feel very confidence due to this book. It is easy to follow and a great study guide. It is very insightful. It tells you exactly what each section is about and how to eliminate multiple choice answers. The tests at the back of the book is what the real test would be like. This is a very good book. I highly recommend it. I received this book at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review, which I provided.
customer_reviews.author: tashkins

customer_reviews.title: Good book for GRE test prep
customer_reviews.text: Good book for GRE test prep. Covers lot of information for GRE prep. . I got this at a discounted price in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. All of my reviews are my own opinion and the sellers have no influence over my reviews. The opinion expressed here is just my personal experience/opinion
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I got this GRE Test Prep Book for my son, and it helped him in studying to take the exam. This book contains great information on what to expect during the test. It also contains lots of sample test questions and explanations for the right answers, and they were very easy to understand. It also explains things thoroughly. Received this useful book for testing it and for an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzikiri

customer_reviews.title: Great study guide
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my friend, who is taking the GRE and this book has so many great strategies and questions with through explanations. It even has test taking strategies to improve your score and each section contains mini lessons. This book is very concise, easy to read and easy to understand. I would highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Seale

customer_reviews.title: Great book for QUICK review.
customer_reviews.text: Very informative and interesting book. I like that it provides detailed and specific descriptions on the topics. The only downside is that I would have liked to have more information provided. Because I only give honest reviews, I do want to mention that I received this item at a discount in exchange for this review.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: This book is basically a repeat of the information on ...
customer_reviews.text: This book is basically a repeat of the information on the GRE site. It is especially daunting if you want to review quantitative skills on which you are rusty. All it did was make me panic about the test and seek out other books.
customer_reviews.author: Voracious Reader

customer_reviews.title: Nice guide!
customer_reviews.text: I'm preparing to go to take the GRE soon for a Master's program. This book seems like a great supplement in addition to others to utilize. I love that the book is lightweight so easy to carry around with you. The breakdown of each section is done very well so it makes studying each topic easier! I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Prep prep prep! GRE masterclass
customer_reviews.text: This is an all encompassing review of this years GRE. It helped me immensely to pass the GRE and I highly recommend this in preparation. I received this product at a discounted rate in exchange for an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Brown

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good GRE test prep
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good GRE test prep. It includes the Analytical Writing test, lots of practice questions, answers in the back of the book, etc. It also includes general test-taking skills and tips for reducing your anxiety when taking the GRE. It's a good practice manual. I did receive this product at a discount, but I think I'd pay full price for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Taylor

customer_reviews.title: great study guide
customer_reviews.text: This book is a great study tool for anyone studying for the GRE. It helps with all of the key concepts. It has easy to read lettering and it was a great help to study for the exam. I definitely recommend this book for anyone who needs to study for the GRE. I received this product discounted in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: Kira23

customer_reviews.title: This is a great book, love the practice exams
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book, love the practice exams, enjoyed using this to study much better than anything I found online. The math section is the best ive seen. I received this item in exchange for an honest and unbiased review and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for test questions
customer_reviews.text: I am currently preparing for the GRE and got this as an additional study aid. It does not replace some of the larger GRE prep books, but provides some tips, tricks, and practice questions for the test. If you want to get some more practice answering question in test format, this is a good choice. If you want a full study book, this will not be in depth enough. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: I haven't taken my exam yet... but ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't taken my exam yet...but from what I reviewed in this book, I can say it is well written and covers all the material needed to get a passing score. I received this item at a discount in exchange for my unbiased opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Style Pro

customer_reviews.title: very easy to read and understand
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to know, very easy to read and understand. Practice tests at the end for a refresher. I received this item at a discount for an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua McCurry

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad that I have found it
customer_reviews.text: This product works exactly as stated. I am so glad that I have found it. I truly recommend this product to you and/or a friend. Its price is so worth it. PS, I have received this product at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Good Place to Start
customer_reviews.text: A pretty straight forward book. It was lightweight, a good starter to get studying without feeling overwhelmed. The grammar and questions were all solid, I didn't have any problems. I received this item at a discount or free in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Study Book
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find some beginner study material so I can start studying for the GRE. This book is exactly what I was looking for. It is simple and starts off with really describing everything I need to know about the GRE. I would definetly recommend this to anyone who is trying to start studying. I received this item at a discount for my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Thersav

customer_reviews.title: Good little book
customer_reviews.text: Well organized book - covers the basics needed to study for the GRE. Great for anyone who does not want to be overwhelmed studying. I received this item at a discount in order to test and provide my honest and unbiased review.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: My GRE score improved
customer_reviews.text: I love this prep, I'm studying for my grad school and I had to do well on my GRE to get into my school and was really concerned how I could score high buy this helped me a lot and got a great score. I left an honest and unbiased review for this product for a discount.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: So far this is a good GRE prep book
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a good GRE prep book. Easy to understand and seems to be helping a lot with studying. Would recommend this product to others. I received this product free to give a 100 percent unbiased review
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: i received this product at a discount in exchange for my unbiased and honest review. this product came as pictured and quickly. i have been studying to take the GRE's and this book has been very helpful and I feel as if it will allow me to be as ready as possible to take the exam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very highly recommended tool
customer_reviews.text: great test prep and very up to date I received this product at a discount for an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Torres

customer_reviews.title: Seller was great, the book material wasn't that good
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as described,but not my favorite study guide , nothing bad about the seller just not my favorite book
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: ... cousin who is study for this text was very happy with
customer_reviews.text: my cousin who is study for this text was very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Athena parker

customer_reviews.title: The book was great, the material covered so much that was very ...
customer_reviews.text: The book was great, the material covered so much that was very simple, yet needed to be refreshed in my brain. My only complaint is the text could be a little bigger, my eyes were straining to read it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Danforth

customer_reviews.title: Well organized
customer_reviews.text: I do great studying with practice tests. Its easy to take the practice tests, grade them, then go back through the book and see the areas I need to study more. Well organized book. I received a discount for my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: John Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: ... my first GRE prep purchase and it is a useful guide. It clarifies GRE sections in a way ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my first GRE prep purchase and it is a useful guide. It clarifies GRE sections in a way that is less daunting than most study guides that I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this, I'm getting amazing insight on the test I anticipate taking.
customer_reviews.author: Farhana Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: GRE test prep
customer_reviews.text: I throughly enjoyed this GRE practice test. It resembles the test to a Tea and therefore I felt comfortable taking the test.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought this study guide was very informative and straight to the point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Concise
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to comprehend and a nice, concise way to explain the content of the exam.

customer_reviews.title: Need valuable reviews from actual test takers that used this guide!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the feedbacks here are lacking in verified purchases; biased reviews?
